citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Seven rabbits were utilized between 8/6/2023 and 8/23/2023 in procedures not included in the IACUC approved protocol.
The discrepancy was identified by DLAR and activity of the lab associated with the protocol was paused.
Failure of notification to request changes in protocol resulted in the IACUC's inability to carry out its function to review and
approve proposed significant changes in care and use of animals in order to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare
Act. The IACUC must review and approve significant changes regarding the use of animals in ongoing activities prior to
implementation.
Correct by January 10th, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(6) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Seven rabbits were utilized between 8/6/2023 and 8/23/2023 in procedures not included in the IACUC approved protocol. 
The discrepancy was identified by DLAR and activity of the lab associated with the protocol was paused.  
 
Failure of notification to request changes in protocol resulted in the IACUC's inability to carry out its function to review and 
approve proposed significant changes in care and use of animals in order to ensure compliance with the Animal Welfare 
Act. The IACUC must review and approve significant changes regarding the use of animals in ongoing activities prior to 
implementation. 
 
Correct by January 10th, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
